product_name: New Balance W870 Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A stable running shoe doesn't have to be a heavy running shoe. The women's New Balance W870 Road-Running Shoes reign on the light side of stability, with uppers offering a breathable, comfortable fit.
short_description: A stable running shoe doesn't have to be a heavy running shoe. The women's New Balance W870 Road-Running Shoes reign on the light side of stability, with uppers offering a breathable, comfortable fit.
